segments.text: Why do you choose our company to apply for a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wish to have a job in which I can make good use of my strengths and have further improvement . And your company meets all my requirements .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got a clear idea about our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have purposefully done some homework in advance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I have applied to several companies recently . But I am most satisfied with your company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you take a job which is not in line with your major ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Admittedly , I hope it is a job in line with my specialty . But I will make the best effort to do the job whatever is assigned to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long would you work here if you were admitted ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would continue to work in the company as long as the job suits me well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you expect a high salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In my mind , salary is not the most important thing .
segments.speaker: S2
